definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

pinyin: xi4 ju4 hua4 ren2 ge2 wei2 chang2
jie3 li2 xing4 ren2 ge2 ji2 huan4
bian1 yuan2 xing4 ren2 ge2 zhang4 ai4
lei4 jing1 shen2 fen1 lie4 xing2 ren2 ge2 wei2 chang2
containing_words.word: 类精神分裂型人格违常

sentences.english: So the personality theory's got to go.
sentences.chinese: 所以不该采用人格理论了。

sentences.english: The first part narrates Shang and Zhou period personalities do not stand independently.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分讲述商周时期人格的不独立。

sentences.english: The criminal personality plays an important role in severely violent crimes.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪人格在严重暴力犯罪中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Tao Yuanming's poem which praised the autumn chrysanthemum revealed his noble character.
sentences.chinese: 陶渊明咏秋菊的诗篇显示出他高洁的人格。

sentences.english: A third text is Gherand Samhita by the great sage Gherand .
sentences.chinese: 第三部是圣人格兰达所著的《格兰达集》。

sentences.english: How is it the personality travels?
So when we come to personal identity which we will do in later lecture.
sentences.chinese: 所以，等到我们在后面的课上讲到人格同一性时。

sentences.english: An ideal boundary of individual personality is a free boundary which is opened and showed from benevolence.
sentences.chinese: 个体人格的理想境界是从“仁”开显出来的自由境界。

sentences.english: So I don't exist at Phase D on the personality theory.
sentences.chinese: 所以根据人格理论我在D阶段就不存在了。

sentences.english: She demeans herself by doing his dirty work.
sentences.chinese: 她替他干卑鄙的勾当，贬低了自己的人格。

sentences.english: I swear on my honour that I knew nothing about this.
sentences.chinese: 我以人格担保我根本不知道这件事。

sentences.english: And his orality could be described literally.
sentences.chinese: 口唇期人格有一些具体的表现。

sentences.english: He libel(l)ed against her character in an article.
sentences.chinese: 他在一篇文章中诽谤她的人格。

sentences.english: It's P-functioning,as we've put it at one time or another.
The right of privacy embodies the dignity and the value of human being.
sentences.chinese: 隐私权作为人格权的一种，体现了人的尊严和价值。

sentences.english: Let's try to refine the personality theory.
sentences.chinese: 让我们给人格论重新定义一下。

definition: one's character/fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)
